text: A Space to Grow is a 1968 American short documentary film produced by Thomas P. Kelly Jr. about Upward Bound programs in Chicago. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== *List of American films of 1968 ==References== ==External links== * *Watch A Space to Grow at the Chicago Film Archives Category:1968 films Category:1968 short films Category:1968 documentary films Category:American films Category:English- language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about education in the United States Category:Documentary films about Chicago Category:American short films
title: A Space to Grow
